name: Global Headquarters - San Antonio
description: Corporate HQ. Executive leadership, corporate functions, investor relations. Downsized from 1.2M to ~80K sq ft in Jan 2024. Source: 10-K FY2024, TPR.

address.formatted_address: 1 Fanatical Place, San Antonio, TX 78218, US

name: Reston Federal Government Office
description: US Government Solutions hub. FedRAMP compliance management, DoD SRG IL2/IL4 operations, cleared personnel. Source: rackspace.com/compliance/fedramp.

name: Austin Office
description: Secondary Texas office. Source: rackspace.com/contact.

name: London Office - Hayes
description: EMEA regional office. Rackspace Limited (Co# 03897010) registered address. UK Sovereign Services support. Source: Companies House, rackspace.com/contact.

name: Hamburg Office
description: Northern European enterprise sales and support. Source: rackspace.com/contact.

name: Sydney Office
description: APAC regional office. Customer-facing operations for Australia/New Zealand market. Source: rackspace.com/contact.

name: Melbourne Office
description: Australia secondary office. Sales and support functions. Source: rackspace.com/contact.

name: Singapore Office
description: APAC office via Just Analytics acquisition (Jan 2022). Source: PitchBook, rackspace.com/contact.

name: Gurgaon Office
description: India primary delivery center. Major engineering and support workforce concentration. Source: 10-K FY2024, rackspace.com/contact.

name: Hyderabad Office
description: India delivery center. Engineering and support operations. Source: rackspace.com/contact.

name: Bangalore Office
description: India delivery center. Source: rackspace.com/contact.

description: Middle East sales office. Regional customer acquisition. Source: rackspace.com/contact.

description: Canada sales office. Source: rackspace.com/contact.

description: Latin America sales office. Source: rackspace.com/contact.

name: Zurich Office
description: International holding and treasury functions. Rackspace International GmbH, Rackspace International Mobility GmbH. Source: S-1 Ex-21.

name: Petaling Jaya Office
description: Malaysia delivery and support center. Source: rackspace.com/contact.

name: Alexandria Office
description: MENA delivery hub via Onica Egypt LLC. Source: S-1 Ex-21, rackspace.com/contact.

name: Ho Chi Minh City Office
description: Vietnam operations via Just Analytics (acquired Jan 2022). Source: PitchBook.

name: Israel Office
description: Datapipe Israel Limited operations. Likely dormant/holdco. Source: S-1 Ex-21.

name: DFW3 - Dallas/Fort Worth Data Center
description: Primary US South DC. Leased from Digital Realty Trust. 15-year lease from Aug 2012, ~$134M total. Source: baxtel.com.

name: Windcrest Data Center (The Castle)
description: Legacy HQ data center. Property sold early 2024 to Industrial Commercial Properties LLC. $9M MEIA early termination fee. Source: Wikipedia (Windsor Park Mall), 10-K FY2024.

address.formatted_address: 9725 Datapoint Drive, Windcrest (San Antonio), TX 78229, US

name: Grapevine Data Center
description: Texas secondary DC. Source: rackspace.com/about/data-centers.

description: Northern Virginia primary DC. FedRAMP-authorized infrastructure. Source: rackspace.com/about/data-centers.

description: Northern Virginia secondary DC. Source: cloudandcolocation.com.

name: SJC3 - Santa Clara Data Center
description: Next-generation data center in Silicon Valley built from ground up with latest OpenStack technology. Hosts Rackspace Spot GPUaaS with NVIDIA H100 Tensor Core GPU instances. Gen-2 provisioning reduces deployment time and increases reliability. Launched Nov 2024. Source: globenewswire.com Nov 4 2024 Rackspace GPUaaS announcement, rackspace.com/newsroom Nov 4 2024.

description: Silicon Valley secondary DC. Source: datacenterlocations.com.

description: US Central DC. Colocation services. Source: rackspace.com/about/data-centers.

description: US Central secondary DC. Property listed for sale per Colliers (NNN lease investment). Source: baxtel.com.

description: US East DC. Colocation services. Source: rackspace.com/about/data-centers.

description: Singapore DC. CLOSED July 2021. Lease ended, footprint reduced, customers migrated. Source: docs.rackspace.com (SIN2 FAQ).

description: Hong Kong DC. APAC operations. Source: datacenterlocations.com.

description: China mainland DC. PIPL/CSL data localization compliance operations. Source: datacenterlocations.com.

name: MOW80 - Moscow Data Center
description: Russia DC. EXITED ~2022 post-sanctions. Inherited from Datapipe acquisition (Sep 2017). Source: 10-K FY2022.

name: Equinix DC1-DC15/DC21-DC22 - Ashburn VA (IX)
description: Equinix Ashburn campus. Rackspace AS12200 100G peering at Equinix IX Ashburn. RackConnect Global Equinix Cloud Exchange: DC1-DC8, DC10, DC11. PeeringDB facility ID 1. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22, datacenterlocations.com/rackspace.

name: Equinix CH1/CH2/CH4 - Chicago IL (IX)
description: Equinix Chicago campus. Rackspace AS12200 10G peering at Equinix IX Chicago. RackConnect Global Equinix Cloud Exchange: CH1-CH4. PeeringDB facility ID 7. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22, datacenterlocations.com/rackspace.

name: Equinix DA1 - Dallas TX (IX)
description: Equinix Dallas. Rackspace AS12200 20G peering at Equinix IX Dallas. RackConnect Global Equinix Cloud Exchange: DA1-DA4, DA6. PeeringDB facility ID 4. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22, datacenterlocations.com/rackspace.

name: Equinix LD5 - London Slough (IX)
description: Equinix Slough, UK. Rackspace AS12200 presence. RackConnect Global Equinix Cloud Exchange Europe: LD5. Adjacent to LON3 Rackspace DC. PeeringDB facility ID 832. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22, datacenterlocations.com/rackspace.

name: Equinix FR2 - Frankfurt North (IX)
description: Equinix Frankfurt North. Rackspace AS12200 10G peering at Equinix IX Frankfurt. Adjacent to FRA1/FRA2 Rackspace DCs. PeeringDB facility ID 457. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22.

name: Equinix AM1/AM2 - Amsterdam (IX)
description: Equinix Amsterdam campus, Luttenbergweg. Rackspace AS12200 presence. Adjacent to AMS2 Rackspace DC. PeeringDB facility ID 375. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22.

name: Equinix NY9 - New York 111 8th Ave (IX)
description: Equinix New York, 111 8th Avenue. Rackspace AS12200 10G peering at Equinix IX New York. PeeringDB facility ID 38. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22.

name: Equinix SV1/SV5/SV10 - San Jose CA (IX)
description: Equinix Silicon Valley campus, San Jose. Rackspace AS12200 10G peering at Equinix IX San Jose. PeeringDB facility ID 6. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22.

name: Equinix SY3 - Sydney (IX)
description: Equinix Sydney. Rackspace AS12200 10G peering at Equinix IX Sydney. Adjacent to SYD2 Rackspace DC. PeeringDB facility ID 1605. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22.

name: Equinix SG1 - Singapore (IX)
description: Equinix Singapore. Rackspace AS12200 presence. Adjacent to SIN2 Rackspace DC. PeeringDB facility ID 282. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22.

name: Telehouse Docklands West - London (IX)
description: Telehouse London Docklands West. Rackspace AS12200 presence. Secondary London interconnection point. PeeringDB facility ID 835. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22.

description: Iron Mountain Data Center Singapore. Rackspace AS12200 presence. Secondary Singapore interconnection point. PeeringDB facility ID 6348. Source: peeringdb.com/net/22.
